thread.title: Aaradhya to join Ash during KJo’s film shoot
thread.title_full: Aaradhya to join Ash during KJo’s film shoot

author: Deccan
title: Aaradhya to join Ash during KJo’s film shoot
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 07, 2015, 23.59 pm Aishwarya Rai Bachchan with her daughter Aaradhya Aishwarya Rai Bachchan is all set to take off for the shoot of her next film Ae Dil Hai Mushkil. The family will bring in Big B’s birthday on October 11 after which she will join the shoot. However, she is not going alone. Aaradhya will also be flying with her. A source said, “It isn’t a very long schedule and Aaradhya will travel with her. Even while shooting for Jazbaa, there was a separate vanity for Aaradhya. With Karan, who is a friend, he will ensure that even the shooting timings of Aishwarya are such that she isn’t away from her daughter for too long.” Bollywood Aishwarya Rai Bachchan Ae Dil Hai Mushkil movie Aaradhya Also Read Won’t endorse consumer goods: Anupam Kher Shilpa, Twinkle, Karisma at Anu Dewan's son's birthday bash Watch: Alia Bhatt's 'dark' confession When a four-wheel ride made Shahid Kapoor smile
